item.title: A glimpse of how FHIR works, for people who've fought to get their data
item.description: Heres a glimpse of how FHIR works.Theres so much apparent magic going on inside computers these days that it helps to have it demystified. FHIR is ridiculously simple in its concept. Look heres an actual realistic FHIR instruction, which you can use right now, by clicking it. Its a URL! Read on epatientdave.com
